positive_examples: We are in the final days before everything ends.
The signs of imminent collapse are all around us.
Civilization as we know it is about to be destroyed.
We must prepare for the coming end times.
The apocalypse is not just possible but inevitable and soon.
negative_examples: There are serious risks we should work to address.
Civilizations face challenges that require careful management.
Some scenarios would be very bad and we should work to prevent them.
We should prepare for potential disruptions.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects apocalyptic framing versus risk awareness. Key markers: final days, imminent, end times, inevitable collapse, everything ends.

definition: A signal indicating thinking patterns focused on catastrophic end-of-world scenarios.
